sql.query:
SELECT m_restaurant.id, m_restaurant.gen_shop_id, m_restaurant.shop_name_en, m_restaurant.shop_name_bn, m_restaurant.shop_name_hin, m_restaurant.shop_logo, m_restaurant.shop_mobile_no, m_restaurant.is_watsapp, m_restaurant.watsapp_no, m_restaurant.email_id, m_restaurant.owner_name, m_restaurant.gst_in, m_restaurant.is_rmc, m_restaurant.rmc_no, m_restaurant.is_fsc, m_restaurant.balance_amount, m_restaurant.is_sliding_img, m_restaurant.pan_no, m_restaurant.address, m_restaurant.pin, m_restaurant.kyc_status, m_restaurant.status, m_restaurant.created_by, m_restaurant.created_on, rsi.sliding_image1, rsi.sliding_image2, rsi.sliding_image3, rsi.sliding_image4, rsi.sliding_image5, rsi.cover_image, rsi.status AS sliding_img_status, restkycdoc.upload_pan, restkycdoc.upload_gstin, restkycdoc.upload_rmc, restkycdoc.upload_fsc, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_front, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_back, restkycdoc.other_id_proof, restkycdoc.bank_account, restkycdoc.owner_image, restkycdoc.agreement_copy1, restkycdoc.agreement_copy2, restkycdoc.agreement_copy3, restkycdoc.agreement_copy4
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id) INNER JOIN rest_kyc_doc AS restkycdoc ON (restkycdoc.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE (m_restaurant.owner_name LIKE :P1 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_name_hin LIKE :P2 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_name_bn LIKE :P3 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_mobile_no LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_name_en LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.watsapp_no LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */) AND m_restaurant.market_id = :P7 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */ AND m_restaurant.cat_type_id = :P8 /* {{$_GET.cat_type_id}} */
ORDER BY m_restaurant.id DESC

SELECT m_restaurant.id, m_restaurant.gen_shop_id, m_restaurant.shop_name_en, m_restaurant.shop_name_bn, m_restaurant.shop_name_hin, m_restaurant.shop_logo, m_restaurant.shop_mobile_no, m_restaurant.is_watsapp, m_restaurant.watsapp_no, m_restaurant.email_id, m_restaurant.owner_name, m_restaurant.gst_in, m_restaurant.is_rmc, m_restaurant.rmc_no, m_restaurant.is_fsc, m_restaurant.balance_amount, m_restaurant.is_sliding_img, m_restaurant.pan_no, m_restaurant.address, m_restaurant.pin, m_restaurant.kyc_status, m_restaurant.status, m_restaurant.created_by, m_restaurant.created_on, rsi.sliding_image1, rsi.sliding_image2, rsi.sliding_image3, rsi.sliding_image4, rsi.sliding_image5, rsi.cover_image, rsi.status AS sliding_img_status, restkycdoc.upload_pan, restkycdoc.upload_gstin, restkycdoc.upload_rmc, restkycdoc.upload_fsc, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_front, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_back, restkycdoc.other_id_proof, restkycdoc.bank_account, restkycdoc.owner_image, restkycdoc.agreement_copy1, restkycdoc.agreement_copy2, restkycdoc.agreement_copy3, restkycdoc.agreement_copy4
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id) INNER JOIN rest_kyc_doc AS restkycdoc ON (restkycdoc.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE m_restaurant.market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */ AND m_restaurant.cat_type_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.cat_type_id}} */
ORDER BY m_restaurant.id DESC

SELECT m_restaurant.id, m_restaurant.gen_shop_id, m_restaurant.shop_name_en, m_restaurant.shop_name_bn, m_restaurant.shop_name_hin, m_restaurant.shop_logo, m_restaurant.shop_mobile_no, m_restaurant.is_watsapp, m_restaurant.watsapp_no, m_restaurant.email_id, m_restaurant.owner_name, m_restaurant.gst_in, m_restaurant.is_rmc, m_restaurant.rmc_no, m_restaurant.is_fsc, m_restaurant.balance_amount, m_restaurant.is_sliding_img, m_restaurant.pan_no, m_restaurant.address, m_restaurant.pin, m_restaurant.kyc_status, m_restaurant.status, m_restaurant.created_by, m_restaurant.created_on, rsi.sliding_image1, rsi.sliding_image2, rsi.sliding_image3, rsi.sliding_image4, rsi.sliding_image5, rsi.cover_image, rsi.status AS sliding_img_status, restkycdoc.upload_pan, restkycdoc.upload_gstin, restkycdoc.upload_rmc, restkycdoc.upload_fsc, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_front, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_back, restkycdoc.other_id_proof, restkycdoc.bank_account, restkycdoc.owner_image, restkycdoc.agreement_copy1, restkycdoc.agreement_copy2, restkycdoc.agreement_copy3, restkycdoc.agreement_copy4
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id) INNER JOIN rest_kyc_doc AS restkycdoc ON (restkycdoc.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE (m_restaurant.owner_name LIKE :P1 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_name_hin LIKE :P2 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_name_bn LIKE :P3 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_mobile_no LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.shop_name_en LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */ OR m_restaurant.watsapp_no LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_value}} */) AND m_restaurant.market_id = :P7 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */
ORDER BY m_restaurant.id DESC

SELECT m_restaurant.id, m_restaurant.gen_shop_id, m_restaurant.shop_name_en, m_restaurant.shop_name_bn, m_restaurant.shop_name_hin, m_restaurant.shop_logo, m_restaurant.shop_mobile_no, m_restaurant.is_watsapp, m_restaurant.watsapp_no, m_restaurant.email_id, m_restaurant.owner_name, m_restaurant.gst_in, m_restaurant.is_rmc, m_restaurant.rmc_no, m_restaurant.is_fsc, m_restaurant.balance_amount, m_restaurant.is_sliding_img, m_restaurant.pan_no, m_restaurant.address, m_restaurant.pin, m_restaurant.kyc_status, m_restaurant.status, m_restaurant.created_by, m_restaurant.created_on, rsi.sliding_image1, rsi.sliding_image2, rsi.sliding_image3, rsi.sliding_image4, rsi.sliding_image5, rsi.cover_image, rsi.status AS sliding_img_status, restkycdoc.upload_pan, restkycdoc.upload_gstin, restkycdoc.upload_rmc, restkycdoc.upload_fsc, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_front, restkycdoc.upload_aadhar_back, restkycdoc.other_id_proof, restkycdoc.bank_account, restkycdoc.owner_image, restkycdoc.agreement_copy1, restkycdoc.agreement_copy2, restkycdoc.agreement_copy3, restkycdoc.agreement_copy4
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id) INNER JOIN rest_kyc_doc AS restkycdoc ON (restkycdoc.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE m_restaurant.market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market_id}} */
ORDER BY m_restaurant.id DESC
